posts.postText:
Ok here are a few things I did after I made myself own the server on GT...

For your sig:
 http://cache.www.gametracker.com/server_info/69.197.191.226:27015/b_350_20_000000_000000_DF0707_740202.png  
 Locate the image (view image on right click) and link it to http://www.gametracker.com/server_info/69.197.191.226:27015/ 


Hacked version to join the game server (insta-join):
 http://cache.www.gametracker.com/server_info/69.197.191.226:27015/b_350_20_000000_000000_DF0707_740202.png  
 Locate the image (view image on right click) and link it to steam://connect/69.197.191.226:27015/ 


A simple "support tag" (a.k.a ad) that's text based and will link to the server..

>> Press it - I dare you! \/
steam://connect/69.197.191.226:27015/ 
 

On your website:
 http://cache.www.gametracker.com/server_info/69.197.191.226:27015/b_160_400_1_ffffff_c5c5c5_ffffff_000000_1_0_0.png  
 Locate the image (view image on right click) and link it to http://www.gametracker.com/server_info/69.197.191.226:27015/ 

Again, a different one:

 http://cache.www.gametracker.com/server_info/69.197.191.226:27015/b_160_400_0_BE131B_85B03B_C2F962_000000_1_0_0.png  
 Locate the image (view image on right click) and link it to http://www.gametracker.com/server_info/69.197.191.226:27015/
Really cool stuff you got there :P
